hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.swing

Class SwingObservables.ObservableMouseListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.reactive.DefaultObservable<java.awt.event.MouseEvent>
      • hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.swing.SwingObservables.ObservableMouseListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Observable<java.awt.event.MouseEvent>, Observer<java.awt.event.MouseEvent>, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.event.MouseWheelListener, java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.util.EventListener
    Enclosing class:
    SwingObservables

    public static class SwingObservables.ObservableMouseListener
extends DefaultObservable<java.awt.event.MouseEvent>
implements java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.event.MouseWheelListener
    The observable mouse listener which relays all mouse related events (movement, clicks, wheel) to next(). events and relays it to next(). The original type can be determined by using MouseEvent.getID() which can be one of the following value:
    • MouseListener events
      • MouseEvent.MOUSE_CLICKED
      • MouseEvent.MOUSE_PRESSED
      • MouseEvent.MOUSE_RELEASED
      • MouseEvent.MOUSE_ENTERED
      • MouseEvent.MOUSE_EXITED
    • MouseMotionListener events
      • MouseEvent.MOUSE_MOVED
      • MouseEvent.MOUSE_DRAGGED
    • MouseWheelListener events
      • MouseEvent.MOUSE_WHEEL
    This observable never signals finish() or error().
    Author:
    akarnokd, 2011.02.01.

      • register

        @Nonnull
public static SwingObservables.ObservableMouseListener register(@Nonnull
                                                        java.awt.Component component)
        Convenience method to register an observer on the component for all mouse event types. To unregister, use the Component.removeMouseListener(), Component.removeMouseMotionListener() and Component.removeMouseWheelListener() methods.
        Parameters:
        component - the target component.
        Returns:
        the new observable

public SwingObservables.ObservableMouseListener registerWith(@Nonnull

        Parameters:

        Returns:
